name: Silent's Night
description:
You are in a old place and you must survive! But you are NOT alone there, you would be attacket by monster. Defend them with your Flashlight and Frontdoor. But still remember to activate/deactivate the Heater.

  • With "W" close you the Frontdoor and can be opened with "S"
  • Hold "LMB" to flash your Flashlight
  • Hover the Mouse at the Button below to open the Control Panel, there you can check the temperatur and change the Heather on/off.
  • Survive to 6 am
  • Check your power and dont let the power run out.
  • Silent can be defend by the Frontdoor. He will laugh when he attack you but later not any more.
  • Larry hates Light and will be go away but doors cant stop him.
  • Anton is fast and hate Light to but he dont go away, he will be aggresiver. Doors can stop him.

My record is to finish night 4. If you have a higher record, let it me know in the comens below. Good luck and enjoy the HORROR :D!
